overview.overviewDescription: This three-day course provides participants with the knowledge and skills to establish, implement, maintain, and continually improve a Business Continuity Management System (BCMS) based on ISO 22301. Participants will also learn how to conduct an internal audit of a BCMS.

keyHighlights: Understand the fundamentals of business continuity and the requirements of ISO 22301.
Learn how to establish, implement, and maintain a BCMS.
Develop the skills to conduct an internal audit of a BCMS.
Gain insights into best practices for business continuity management.

prerequisites.title: PRE-REQUISITES
prerequisites.subInfo: No prior knowledge of business continuity management is required. However, it is recommended that participants have a basic understanding of management systems.

overview.overviewDescription: This two-day course provides a comprehensive overview of the Data Privacy Act of 2012 (DPA) and its implementing rules and regulations. Participants will learn how to comply with the DPA and implement a data privacy management system.

keyHighlights: Understand the principles of data privacy and the requirements of the DPA.
Learn how to conduct a privacy impact assessment (PIA).
Develop a data privacy management program.
Understand the rights of data subjects and the obligations of personal information controllers and processors.

prerequisites.title: PRE-REQUISITES
prerequisites.subInfo: No prior knowledge of data privacy is required.
